Method Detail

getCookieValue

public static java.lang.String getCookieValue(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                              java.lang.String cookieName,
                                              java.lang.String defaultValue)
Gets the value stored in the specified cookie.

Parameters:
request - The HttpServletRequest to search.
cookieName - The name of the cookie.
defaultValue - The value to return if the cookie does not exist.
Returns:
The value of the named cookie if found, otherwise the specified default.

setCookieValue

public static void setCookieValue(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                                  java.lang.String cookieName,
                                  java.lang.String cookieValue,
                                  int maxAge)
Sets the value of the specified cookie.

Parameters:
response - The HttpServletResponse to store the cookie in.
cookieName - The name of the cookie to update.
cookieValue - The value to store in the cookie.
maxAge - The age of the cookie in seconds, 0 means session cookie.

getPageSize

public static java.lang.String getPageSize(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
Gets the value stored in the page size cookie.

Parameters:
request - The HttpServletRequest to search.
Returns:
The value of the page size cookie if found, otherwise the page size default.

setPageSize

public static void setPageSize(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                               java.lang.String pageSize)
Sets the value of the page size cookie.

Parameters:
response - The HttpServletResponse to store the cookie in.
pageSize - The value to store in the page size cookie.
